title: PROJECT Merch Quest Help.
body:
Was wondering if anyone knew if you need to use a PROJECT skin, ward skin AND icon.
Or just one icon etc.
Also has anyone got the same problem witht the page that it wont show any information?
http://imgur.com/a/yfXC5
http://imgur.com/a/VGAkn

replies.body: win 3 matchmade games playing with any PROJECT skin, ward skin **or** summoner icon by 8/15/16.

So it means it could be any type of match? to say a ranked game or a araam game? and also after the quest is done are we able to purchase both hoodies or do we get one for free then have to purchase the other one?
i won 3 normal games using project stuff but it just shows "check progress"
